'''Secretum Secretorum''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] in [[Version 2.3]].

==Wish Details==
===Duration===
* 2021-11-24 11:00:00 UTC+8 &ndash; 2021-12-14 17:59:59

===Summary===
* During this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Kreideprinz" [[Albedo]] ({{Geo}}) will get a huge drop-rate boost!
* During this event wish, the 4-star characters "Trial by Fire" [[Bennett]] ({{Pyro}}), "Chivalric Blossom" [[Noelle]] ({{Geo}}), and "Thorny Benevolence" [[Rosaria]] ({{Cryo}}) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."
* For information about rates, see [[Wish]]es.
